plays.text: Penalty to Ian White 2 minutes for High-sticking Alexei Kovalev
Goal scored by Andrei Kostitsyn assisted by Christopher Higgins and Tomas Plekanec
Penalty to Mats Sundin 2 minutes for Interference Mike Johnson
Penalty to Darcy Tucker 5 minutes for Fighting Francis Bouillon
Penalty to Sheldon Souray 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Francis Bouillon 5 minutes for Fighting Darcy Tucker
Goal scored by Kyle Wellwood (Power Play) assisted by Bryan McCabe and Carlo Colaiacovo
Penalty to Andy Wozniewski 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Ian White 2 minutes for Roughing Guillaume Latendresse
Penalty to Guillaume Latendresse 2 minutes for Roughing Ian White
Penalty to Michael Ryder 2 minutes for Hooking Yanic Perreault
Penalty to Mats Sundin 2 minutes for Interference Christopher Higgins
Goal scored by Saku Koivu assisted by Francis Bouillon
Penalty to Andrei Kostitsyn 2 minutes for Tripping Chad Kilger
Penalty to Maxim Lapierre 2 minutes for Roughing Nik Antropov
Penalty to Nik Antropov 2 minutes for Roughing Maxim Lapierre
Goal scored by Pavel Kubina assisted by Kyle Wellwood and Darcy Tucker
Alexei Kovalev shootout attempt against Andrew Raycroft with a Wide of Net results in a MISS.
Kyle Wellwood shootout attempt against Jaroslav Halak with a Backhand results in a SAVE.
Tomas Plekanec shootout attempt against Andrew Raycroft with a Wide of Net results in a MISS.
Mats Sundin shootout attempt against Jaroslav Halak with a Wristshot results in a GOAL.
Saku Koivu shootout attempt against Andrew Raycroft with a Wristshot results in a GOAL.
Yanic Perreault shootout attempt against Jaroslav Halak with a Wide of Net results in a MISS.
Andrei Kostitsyn shootout attempt against Andrew Raycroft with a Wristshot results in a GOAL.
Darcy Tucker shootout attempt against Jaroslav Halak with a Wristshot results in a SAVE.
